titleStmt.title: A letter from Mr. Marshall and Mr. Nye, appointed assistants to the commissioners of Scotland to their brethren in England, concerning the successe of their affaires there, partly concerning the covenant.
titleStmt.author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Bellamy and Ralph Smith,

notesStmt.note: First edition? One of two editions published.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
